headline: Assurant (AIZ) Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of insurance services company Assurant (NYSE:AIZ) jumped 10.6% in the afternoon session after the company reported strong second-quarter financial results that surpassed expectations and raised its full-year outlook. The specialty insurance provider posted adjusted earnings of $5.56 per share, which handily topped analyst estimates of $4.43. Revenue also grew 8% from the prior year to $3.16 billion. The strong performance stemmed from growth across its Global Housing and Global Lifestyle

headline: Assurant Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues & Premiums Rise Y/Y
summary: AIZ reports Q2 net operating income of $5.56 per share, up 36.3% and beating estimates by 25.5%.
